could your CMOS battery be old? when you first start your computer, enter BIOS and see if the time is still correct.

ntp work best if the system time and the ntp time is fairly similar (they should not drift too much). Yes, it is still correct while you have the computer on, but see in BIOS if it is resetted if you have turned your computer off for a while. if it is resetted it is probably the CMOS battery
